attributes.action: change the practice of lawyers charging by the day/hour to charging by the case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Court cases take far longer today than in the past.  The average murder trial in the first half of the 20th century was 3 days.  Lawyers should be forced to charge per case to ensure there is no benefit to dragging out the simplest case.
